required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on April 10, 2017
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Retrospective Study of Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus on Dapagliflozin Therapy in Taiwan
clinical_study.official_title: Retrospective Study of Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus on Dapagliflozin Therapy in Taiwan

brief_summary.textblock: Retrospective Study of Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus on Dapagliflozin Therapy in Taiwan

primary_outcome.description: To assess the change from baseline (time to initiate dapagliflozin*) in HbA1c at 6 months

study_pop.textblock: Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus patients on Dapagliflozin Therapy in Taiwan

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. Outpatient equal to or more than 20 years of age.
2. T2DM patient initiated dapagliflozin after May 1st 2016 as a second line or third line oral anti-diabetic therapy, either as add-on or switching from one to another. Or initiating dapagliflozin as adjunctive therapy for T2DM subjects treated with insulin.
3. Completed follow-up of at least 6 months regardless of continuation on dapagliflozin therapy.
4. Will provide completed and signed written informed consents.
Exclusion Criteria:
1. Subjects with a history of SGLT2 inhibitor therapy other than dapagliflozin prior to Baseline.
2. Subjects with Type 1 diabetes.
3. Treatment with other investigational drugs concurrently during the retrospective data collection period.
